actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require for purposes of food stamp program that income for all households that produce self-employment income be reduced by the amount of self-employment losses.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977, as amended by the Food Security Act of 1985, to require that household income be reduced by any self-employment losses for purposes of food stamp program eligibility. (Current law confines such reductions to self-employment losses as a farmer.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require for purposes of food stamp program that income for all households that produce self-employment income be reduced by the amount of self-employment losses.
